metadata.title: CVE-2024-56372 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: tun: fix tun_napi_alloc_frags()syzbot reported the following crash [1]Issue came with the blamed commit.
